text: Idea: Don’t make this flyout block the button that lets you fix the issue. (It won’t close)
thank you for taking the time to capture this, it has annoyed and frustrated me for years and I thought I was the only one
this also happens if you don't have permission to publish, you'll get a pop-up that prevents you from accessing the links behind it

Hey everyone, I’m looking for examples of a best in class HubSpot instance. A case study or similar that goes through in depth the properties, forms, workflows, sales process, and why it worked to be able to see what a full, high quality portal looks like - has anyone seen something like this?

I'd love the ability to require approvals for anything in HubSpot I want - e.g. deal won stage (unverified deal) and a second deal one stage (verified by manager - good for commission). Or to set discounts above 30% on line items, etc.
